Class to test a neural network

  • Constructor Details

    • Tester

      public Tester(Network network, NavigableMap<Header,List<String>> data, int batchSize, boolean weighted, int numBins)
      General constructor - matches Learner.
      Parameters:
      network - The neural network to train.
      data - All the data to be passed to the network.
      batchSize - The number of datapoints per batch for an epoch.
      weighted - If true then we use the WeightedPartitioner, else we use the Partitioner.
      numBins - If weighted is true and the network is a regressor, then we need to specify the number of bins for the WeightedPartitioner. Otherwise, this parameter is ignored.

    • Tester

      public Tester(Network network, NavigableMap<Header,List<String>> data, int batchSize)
      Default constructor for non-weighted partitions - matches Learner.
      Parameters:
      network - The neural network to train.
      data - All the data to be passed to the network.
      batchSize - The number of datapoints per batch for an epoch.

    • generateConfusion

      public void generateConfusion()
      Creates a confusion matrix and dice scores from the results.

    • printConfusion

      void printConfusion(List<List<Integer>> contingencyTable)
      Prints out the confusion matrix from a contingency table.
      Parameters:
      contingencyTable - Pairwise frequency data for y and y hat values.

    • printDiceScores

      void printDiceScores(List<List<Integer>> contingencyTable)
      Prints out the dice scores from a contingency table.
      Parameters:
      contingencyTable - Pairwise frequency data for y and y hat values.
